location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ä€bu] to Mrs Janette St. John

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly having submitted her husband's name for the Governorship of Mayo College and describing the station and its climate. The letter also states that Pelly has submitted St. John's name for a Political Agent vacancy in Central Asia should he not be chosen as Governor.
